attributes.action: Give the National Living Wage to the Self Employed during Corona Virus  Crisis
attributes.additional_details: Create something nearing fairness by providing the National Living Wage to those that are Self Employed during the Corona Virus Crisis.
attributes.background: The income support for the Self Employed falls far below that of Directors or the Employed. SSP provides less than £400 a week for the Self Employed when up £2500 is being proved to all other employed persons. This is grossly unfair and will drive many hard working entrepreneurs into bankruptcy.

rejection.details:
The National Living Wage is an hourly rate of pay, not a minimum income.

Since you started your petition the Government has announced support for self-employed individuals: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/chancellor-gives-support-to-millions-of-self-employed-individuals

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
